Reborn 1–{4}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
When Nightshift Ghoul becomes reborn, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
